# jsx_a11y/autocomplete-valid <Badge type="info" text="Correctness" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Enforces that an element's autocomplete attribute must be a valid value.

### Why is this bad?

Incorrectly using the autocomplete attribute may decrease the accessibility of the website for users.

### Example

Examples of **incorrect** code for this rule:

```jsx
<input autocomplete="invalid-value" />
```

Examples of **correct** code for this rule:

```jsx
<input autocomplete="name" />
```

- [Rule Source](https://github.com/oxc-project/oxc/blob/main/crates/oxc_linter/src/rules/jsx_a11y/autocomplete_valid.rs)
